item.title: 2-MIB gene detection of source water reservoirs in Shanghai
item.description: Project Information From: Shanghai urban construction investment co., LTD Founding: ￥0.277 M Host: Ming Su Period: Jul, 2018 - Jun, 2019 Project Introduction 基于2-MIB功能基因构建实时荧光定量PCR方法，用于检测水体产嗅潜力。
